name: achète au marché / buys in the market / compra no mercado, 2021
description:
With the series of photographs [quotidiennement / everyday / cotidianamente, 2021] _calkiel defies the biopolitics impressed on her body and with the help of photographer Franklin Lopes registers the performance. Each image is entitled by the action-place where it is performed.
4000x6000 300dpi
